pilots.name: Alpha Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: Sienar Fleet Systems designed the TIE interceptor with four wing-mounted laser cannons, a dramatic increase in firepower over its predecessors.

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.name: Saber Squadron Ace
pilots.text: Led by Baron Soontir Fel, the pilots of Saber Squadron are among the Empire's best. Their TIE interceptors are marked with red stripes to designate pilots with at least ten confirmed kills.

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.name: Soontir Fel
pilots.caption: Ace of Legend
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there is an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc], gain 1 focus token.

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.name: Turr Phennir
pilots.caption: Ambitious Ace
pilots.ability: After you perform an attack, you may perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action, even if you are stressed.

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.name: Ciena Ree

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.ability: After you perform an attack, if the defender was destroyed, gain 1 stress token. After a friendly ship at range 0-3 is destroyed, remove 1 stress token.
pilots.caption: Look Through My Eyes

pilots.name: Gideon Hask

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Inferno Two
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack against a damaged defender, roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: Vult Skerris

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Arrogant Ace
pilots.ability: Action: Gain 1 strain token to recover 1 [Charge]. Before you engage, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform an action.

pilots.name: Commandant Goran

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, choose a friendly ship at range 0-3 with a lower initiative than yours. The chosen ship gains 1 evade token and removes 1 non-stress red token.

pilots.caption: Skystrike Superintendent
pilots.ability: After a friendly ship at range 0-3 with a lower initiative than yours partially executes a maneuver, it may perform a red [Focus] action.

pilots.name: Lieutenant Lorrir

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Requiem for Brentaal
pilots.ability: While you barrel roll, you must use the [[Bank Left] or [Bank Right]] template instead of the [[Straight]] template.

pilots.name: Nash Windrider

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Alderaanian Zealot
pilots.ability: During the Engagement Phase, after a friendly small ship at range 0-3 is destroyed, if that ship has not engaged this phase, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, that ship engages at the current initiative.

pilots.name: Iden Versio
pilots.caption: Battle of Yavin

shipAbility.name: Sensitive Controls
shipAbility.text: During the System Phase, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.ability: Before a friendly TIE at range 0-1 would suffer damage, you may spend 2 [Charge]. If you do, prevent 1 damage.

pilots.name: Sigma 4
pilots.caption: Battle of Yavin

shipAbility.name: Sensitive Controls
shipAbility.text: During the System Phase, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.ability: After you perform a [Barrel Roll] action, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a [Boost] action.

pilots.name: Sigma 5
pilots.caption: Battle of Yavin

shipAbility.name: Sensitive Controls
shipAbility.text: During the System Phase, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.ability: After you perform an attack that hits, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform an [Evade] action.

pilots.name: Sigma 6
pilots.caption: Battle of Yavin

shipAbility.name: Sensitive Controls
shipAbility.text: During the System Phase, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.ability: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a [SLAM] action.

pilots.name: Sigma 7
pilots.caption: Battle of Yavin

shipAbility.name: Sensitive Controls
shipAbility.text: During the System Phase, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.ability: During the System Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] to acquire a lock on an enemy ship at range 0-1.

pilots.name: Second Sister

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Manipulative Monster
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, after the Neutralize Results step, if the attack hit, you may spend 2 [Force]. If you do, change all of your [Hit] results to [Critical Hit] results.
